name: UpdateMiroBoardFrame
description:
Update a frame on a Miro board with new properties.

This tool updates a specific frame on a Miro board. It should be called when you want to modify a frame's data, style, or geometry. Ensure you have the required 'boards:write' scope. Rate limiting is Level 2.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the frame needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the frame.

parameters.name: frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the frame to update on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to update.

parameters.name: frame_update_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing frame properties such as data, style, position, and geometry. Include fields like title, type, fillColor, coordinates, and dimensions.

format.description: Only custom frames are supported at the moment.

title.description: Title of the frame. This title appears at the top of the frame.

type.description: Only free form frames are supported at the moment.

showContent.description: Hide or reveal the content inside a frame (Enterprise plan only).

data.description: Contains frame item data, such as the title, frame type, or frame format.

fillColor.description:
Fill color for the frame.
Hex values: `#f5f6f8` `#d5f692` `#d0e17a` `#93d275` `#67c6c0` `#23bfe7` `#a6ccf5` `#7b92ff` `#fff9b1` `#f5d128` `#ff9d48` `#f16c7f` `#ea94bb` `#ffcee0` `#b384bb` `#000000`

style.description: Contains information about the style of a frame item, such as the fill color.

x.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

y.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

position.description: Contains information about the item's position on the board, such as its `x` coordinate, `y` coordinate, and the origin of the `x` and `y` coordinates.

height.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

width.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

geometry.description: Contains geometrical information about the item, such as its width or height.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the frame.
